Package com.gej.map

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapLoader
    This interface is used by the Map class to load the objects dynamically on demand.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Map
    This class represents a map (tile-based of course!) which is currently playing the game.
    MapInfo
    This class is required to know all the information about the maps and to switch the maps more easily from the MapManager class
    MapManager
    A manager to control the order of maps to be loaded.
    MapView
    Implements the view of the map so that a map can scroll indefinitely.
